definition: to agree on/to settle on
to persuade
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)
to set/to fix/to determine/to decide/to order

sentences.english: Here is the deal. You clean the kitchen and I clean the bathroom.
sentences.chinese: 就這樣說定了，你清掃廚房，我清理浴室。
我們就說定星期一下午。

sentences.english: They have agreed on the time and place.
sentences.chinese: 他們已經說定了時間和地點。

sentences.english: That should be fine, Shall we say about 2 o'clock?
sentences.chinese: 應該沒有問題，我們說定2點左右？
那麼就這樣說定了，好嗎？

sentences.english: He recommends regular hot water rinses and massaging of the scalp with fingertips.
sentences.chinese: 他說定期使用熱水沖洗，用手指按摩頭皮是比較好的。

definition: arranged betrothal of minors
pretty close/very near/about right
to tackle a difficult job (idiom)/to do sth reluctantly
I appreciate your kindness (conventional reply to turn down an offer)
to make fun of/to seek diversion
to know the score (idiom)/to be well aware of the situation
A rabbit doesn't eat the grass by its own burrow (idiom); One shouldn't do anything to harm one's neighbors.
pinyin: tu4 zi5 bu4 chi1 wo1 bian1 cao3

definition: foolish talk/nonsense
to face the wall and ponder about one's misdeeds/to stand in the corner (punishment)/(fig.) to examine one's conscience
to get straight to the point (idiom)
Every family goes through its problems. (idiom)
pinyin: jia1 jia1 you3 ben3 nan2 nian4 de5 jing1

definition: see 領盒飯|领盒饭[ling3 he2 fan4]
to be absent-minded/to desert/to abscond from the army/absent without leave (AWOL)
to have boundless prospects
demure/prudish/hypocritical
to bring trouble on oneself (idiom)
